service.name: Mesh Proxy Service
service.informativeText: Abstract: The Mesh Proxy Service is used to enable a server to send and receive Proxy PDUs with a client.

characteristic.name: Mesh Proxy Data In
characteristic.informativeText: Abstract: The Mesh Proxy Data In characteristic is used by the client to send Proxy PDUs to the server

characteristic.name: Mesh Proxy Data Out
characteristic.informativeText: Abstract: The Mesh Proxy Data Out characteristic is used by the server to send Proxy PDUs to the client.
